testcase.name: Active Inactive Students Detail Report
testcase.system-out: Given user enters url"http://qaerp.franciscanecare.net".....................passed When enter username"admin" and password"Admin@987"..........................passed Then signin.................................................................passed Then home page is opened....................................................passed Then active inactive students detail report is opened.......................passed Then user select user "eCare Admin" on active inactive students detail report is opened.passed Then user select from date as month "October" year "2016" and day"1" on active inactive students detail report page.passed Then user select till date as month "November" year "2016" and day"30" on active inactive students detail report page.passed Then user click inactive on active inactive students detail report page.....passed Then user click show on active inactive students detail report page.........passed

testcase.name: Advance Payment Report
testcase.system-out: Given user enters url"http://qaerp.franciscanecare.net".....................passed When enter username"admin" and password"Admin@987"..........................passed Then signin.................................................................passed Then home page is opened....................................................passed Then advance payment report is opened.......................................passed Then user select installment"JANUARY - MARCH" on advance payment report.....passed Then user select class"1" on advance payment report.........................passed Then user select section"A" on advance payment report.......................passed Then user select fee type"SCHOOL FEE" on advance payment report.............passed Then user click on show on advance payment report...........................passed
